INVALID_ORDER_MESSAGE: You must have a valid order before performing that operation! [EMPTY ORDER OR NO ORDER]
INVALID_ITEM_MESSAGE: You selected an invalid  menu item for that operation! [OPERATION NOT DEFINED]
INVALID_RESERVATION_MESSAGE: You selected an invalid reservation! That operation cannot be performed! [INVALID RESERVATION]
NO_SELECTION_MESSAGE: You must select a valid item to perform this operation! [NO ITEM SELECTED]
